segments.advisor_message: Now, let’s talk about your current living situation. Can you confirm if you're renting or do you own your home?
segments.client_message: I think we mentioned before that I was renting, but actually, I just bought my house a couple of months ago. So, I own it now!

segments.advisor_message: That’s great news! Can you provide me with the address of your new home?
segments.client_message: Sure, it’s at 123 Maple Street, Springfield, zip 12345. I also moved in on September 1st.
